channel.title: Same config as HL2 and still dont run properly
channel.description:
Hi u all,
Since I ve istalled black mesa, Ive had problems, it doesnt run properly , and I dont know why. Im runnin the game with the recomended Config and the game gets lagged in each crowded scenes.Ive been playing Half Life 2 with full video features, and It was very fluent. But same config in Blackmesa and gets lagged every fuc**** time that I play. Maybe its due to that the game is not compatible with my hardware ? dunno My pc Features: Intel core 2 duo 3.06GHz Ati Radeon HD 4600 (1Gb) 3Gb RAM
What could be the problem ? Even if a chose low graphics it runs shitty
thx for reading !
